author: @latribunahn
title: La peor tormenta solar geomagnética desde 2005 se presenta este fin de semana - Diario La Tribuna
text: La SWPC (Centro de Predicción Meteorológica Espacial de EE.UU.) emitió una alerta sobre la primera tormenta solar geomagnética crítica desde el 2005. Esta tormenta solar geomagnética podría provocar posibles interrupciones en los sistemas de energía, las operaciones satelitales y los servicios de GPS. Desde este 8 de mayo se han observado al menos cinco eyecciones de masa coronal (CME, por sus siglas en inglés) dirigidas hacia la tierra. “Las CME son explosiones de plasma y campos magnéticos procedentes de la corona solar”, explica el SWPC. Estas explosiones solares podrían impacta al planeta este viernes 10 de mayo al mediodía y durar hasta el domingo 12 de mayo. Según el SWPC, una tormenta de estas características también podría hacer que la aurora se viera tan al sur como en Alabama y el norte de California. Comunicado de la NOOA NOAA pronostica tormenta solar severa; Disponibilidad de medios prevista para el 10 de mayo. El Centro de Predicción del Clima Espacial (SWPC) de la NOAA, una división del Servicio Meteorológico Nacional, está monitoreando el sol luego de una serie de erupciones solares y eyecciones de masa coronal (CME) que comenzaron el 8 de mayo. Los pronosticadores del clima espacial han emitido un Severo (G4) Vigilancia de tormenta geomagnética para la noche del viernes 10 de mayo. Erupciones solares adicionales podrían causar que las condiciones de tormenta geomagnética persistan durante el fin de semana. Un gran cúmulo de manchas solares ha producido varias erupciones solares de moderadas a fuertes desde el miércoles a las 5:00 am ET. Al menos cinco llamaradas estuvieron asociadas con CME que parecen estar dirigidas a la Tierra. Los pronosticadores del SWPC monitorearán los activos espaciales de la NOAA y la NASA para detectar el inicio de una tormenta geomagnética. Las CME son explosiones de plasma y campos magnéticos de la corona solar. Provocan tormentas geomagnéticas cuando se dirigen a la Tierra. Las tormentas geomagnéticas pueden afectar la infraestructura en la órbita cercana a la Tierra y en la superficie de la Tierra, interrumpiendo potencialmente las comunicaciones, la red eléctrica, la navegación, las operaciones de radio y satélites. SWPC ha notificado a los operadores de estos sistemas para que puedan tomar medidas de protección. Las tormentas geomagnéticas también pueden provocar espectaculares manifestaciones de auroras en la Tierra. QUÉ: Disponibilidad de los medios a través de teleconferencia sobre el evento meteorológico espacial que se está desarrollando y la Vigilancia de tormentas geomagnéticas. QUIÉN: Expertos del Centro de Predicción del Clima Espacial de la NOAA CUÁNDO: viernes 10 de mayo de 2024; 10 a.m.EDT

author: @elmananarey
title: Atlanta United interesado en estrella de la Liga MX
text:
[Deportes](/deportes)
Paulinho es pretendido por un gigante de la MLS
La liga estadounidense de futbol ha crecido bastante en los últimos años, convirtiéndose en un poderoso mercado y muy atractivo para varios jugadores del planeta.La liga estadounidense de futbol ha crecido bastante en los últimos años, convirtiéndose en un poderoso mercado y muy atractivo para varios jugadores del planeta.
Actualmente, tiene en sus filas a estrellas como Lionel Messi, Luis Suárez y el francés Hugo Lloris, una lista a la que se podría sumar una estrella de la Liga MX.
Se trata de Paulinho, jugador estrella de Toluca que se encuentra en el radar del Atlanta United de la MLS, institución que estaría dispuesto a pagar la cláusula de 15 millones de dólares.
De acuerdo con información del medio portugués "O Jogo", será en las próximas semanas cuando pueda darse el movimiento para buscar cosas importantes en 2025.
El delantero portugués se convirtió en el pasado torneo de Apertura 2024 en el máximo anotador del balompié azteca, luego de marcar 13 goles.

author: Keri Rutherford
title: Is Chennai hotter than Coimbatore positive degree?
text:
Is Chennai hotter than Coimbatore positive degree?
Yes, Chennai is hotter than Coimbatore in the positive degree of comparison. The sentence “Chennai is hotter than Coimbatore” is already in the positive degree.
What is an example of a positive degree to a comparative degree?
An example of changing a sentence from the positive degree to the comparative degree is:
Positive degree: The cat runs fast.
Comparative degree: The cat runs faster than dogs.
How do you change a sentence into a superlative degree?
To change a sentence into the superlative degree, we add “-est” to the end of the adjective. For example:
Positive degree: She is tall.
Superlative degree: She is the tallest.
Are few cities in India as big as Chennai change into superlative degree?
Yes, the sentence “Very few cities in India are as big as Chennai” can be changed into the superlative degree as:
Superlative degree: Chennai is the biggest city in India.
What are the degrees of comparison change?
The degrees of comparison are the positive degree, comparative degree, and superlative degree.
What is the rule for positive degree?
The rule for the positive degree is to use the adjective or adverb in its original form without any comparative or superlative endings. For example:
Positive degree: The cat runs fast.
What are the degrees of comparison warmer?
The degrees of comparison for the adjective “warmer” are positive, comparative, and superlative. These degrees are used to make comparisons and describe nouns emphasizing the level of warmth. For example:
Positive degree: It is warm outside.
Comparative degree: It is warmer today than yesterday.
Superlative degree: Today is the warmest day of the week.
Is Chennai one of the biggest of Indian towns positive degree?
The sentence “Chennai is one of the biggest of Indian towns” is not in the positive degree. It is in the superlative degree. To change it to the positive degree, we can say:
Positive degree: Very few Indian towns are as big as Chennai.
Is Chennai one of the biggest Indian towns change into positive degree?
Yes, the sentence “Chennai is one of the biggest Indian towns” can be changed into the positive degree as:
Positive degree: No other Indian towns are as big as Chennai.
Why is Chennai moderate climate?
Chennai has a moderate climate because it is located on the thermal equator and is also coastal, which prevents extreme variations in seasonal temperature. The weather in Chennai is hot and humid for most of the year.
Is Shimla cooler than Kolkata positive degree?
Yes, the sentence “Shimla is cooler than Kolkata” is already in the positive degree.
What is a positive degree example?
An example of a sentence in the positive degree is:
Positive degree: She is a jolly person.
Is something better than nothing change into positive degree?
To change the sentence “Something is better than nothing” into the positive degree, we can say:
Positive degree: Nothing is not as good as something.
What are 2 degrees of comparison examples?
Examples of the two degrees of comparison are:
Positive degree: She is a smart doctor.
Comparative degree: She is smarter than most other doctors.
Is Chennai India wealthy?
Chennai is considered one of the wealthiest cities in India with a GDP of $66 billion. It contributes 1.12% to India’s GDP.
What is the reason to change Madras to Chennai?
The city of Madras was renamed Chennai in 1996 to remove the last vestiges of British colonialism in the state of Tamil Nadu. The name Chennai is derived from the villages of Madrasapattinam and Chennapatnam, which merged together after the construction of Fort George by the British.
Which are the most happiest cities to live in India?
According to a survey, the happiest cities to live in India are:
1. Kanpur
2. Jaipur
3. Chennai
4. Mangalore
5. Mysore (Mysuru)
6. Hyderabad
7. Pune
8. Chandigarh
Is Chennai the cleanest city in India?
No, Indore is currently ranked as the cleanest city in India according to the cleanliness survey Swachh Survekshan.
Why is Chennai so popular?
Chennai is popular for its rich culture, traditional music (carnatic music), delicious food, beautiful beaches, and famous temples. It is also a popular tourist destination in India, offering a unique experience to visitors.
Why Tamil Nadu is unique in India?
Tamil Nadu is unique in India due to its diverse culture, ancient relics, historic buildings, religious sites, beautiful beaches, hill stations, and UNESCO World Heritage Sites. The state has a thriving tourism industry and is known for its architectural wonders.
What are the 3 types of degrees of comparison?
The three types of degrees of comparison are:
1. Positive degree
2. Comparative degree
3. Superlative degree
What is positive degree in Bengali?
The positive degree in Bengali refers to the form of an adjective or adverb that is used without any comparative or superlative suffix. For example:
Positive degree: গরম (pronounced “gorom”) meaning “hot” in English.
What are the rules for changing degrees?
The rules for changing degrees are:
1. Begin the comparative degree and superlative degree with the same word or phrase.
2. Use the last subject of the comparative or superlative degree after “no other” to begin the sentence.

author: ArcaMax Publishing, Inc.
title: Trader Joe's organic acai bowl recalled over contamination fears
text:
Trader Joe's organic acai bowl recalled over contamination fears
Published in Business News
Trader Joe's has recalled a popular frozen dish over possible plastic contamination, the grocery chain said.
The organic acai bowl, which sells for $3.99, may contain plastic material, the retailer announced last week. The company encouraged customers who had purchased the bowls, which include berries, bananas, granola and dried coconut, to throw them out or return them. The company did not specify how the possible contamination occurred.
"At Trader Joe's, nothing is more important than the health and safety of our customers and Crew Members. With this in mind, we do the daily work to make certain our products meet our stringent food safety expectations," the grocer said in a statement. "We don't take any chances when it comes to product safety and quality."
In December, a Trader Joe's fan page on Instagram announced the product had returned to shelves after a hiatus.
The recall follows other recalls that affected Trader Joe's products: A widespread listeria recall affected some of the brand's cooked chicken products last year, and last week, an issue with easy-open pull tabs on tuna cans prompted recalls over fears of botulism.
Between September and November last year, 26 food recalls hit California, including Fresno-based raw milk infected with the bird flu virus, city of Commerce organic carrots contaminated with E. coli, and cucumbers from Arizona contaminated with salmonella. Experts said testing systems for food have significantly changed over time, making it hard to say if the high number of recalls marks an unusual level of foodborne illnesses.

author: time news
title: Hmpv Virus: Should We Be Concerned About the Rise in Cases in China?
text:
Recent reports ‌have raised⁤ concerns about a respiratory virus known as Hmpv,​ or human metapneumovirus , which is currently‍ seeing a rise in cases in China. However, health authorities clarify that ⁣Hmpv is‍ not a new pathogen; ‌it ‌has ​been circulating since its finding in 2001. while the increase in cases might potentially be attributed​ to enhanced testing,experts emphasize that there is no cause for alarm,as the virus is well-known​ and most individuals⁤ recover ⁣with rest and symptomatic treatment.Transmission occurs through respiratory droplets, and the virus⁤ primarily ⁢affects young ‌children, the elderly, ​and those with weakened immune ⁣systems. As the global community⁣ monitors the situation, maintaining good hygiene⁣ practices remains essential to prevent the⁤ spread of ⁣infections.
Time.news Interview: understanding ​the Rise of Human Metapneumovirus ( HMPV ) in China
Q: Welcome, Dr. Smith. ‍Recent reports indicate⁤ that there’s⁣ a surge‍ in cases ​of HMPV in China. Can you explain what HMPV is and its meaning?
A: Thank you for having me. Human Metapneumovirus, or HMPV, is a common ​respiratory virus that was first identified⁣ in 2001. It​ shares similarities with other respiratory viruses⁤ and ⁢is known to circulate widely, especially during the autumn and ‌winter ⁣months. although‌ we ‌are seeing⁢ an uptick in reported cases, it’s important to ⁤note that⁣ this virus‌ is not new; it has been part of the‌ viral landscape for ‌over two decades.
Q: What do you think has ​contributed to the recent surge in cases of HMPV in ⁤China?
A: The ⁤recent increase can⁣ be partially ‍attributed to enhanced testing and heightened awareness among⁣ healthcare providers and the general public. With many respiratory viruses circulating, including Influenza A,‌ Mycoplasma pneumoniae, and even⁣ COVID-19,⁤ hospitals are experiencing strain, especially pediatric wards which are seeing a rise in pneumonia cases.Children and those with weakened‌ immune systems ‍are particularly vulnerable to severe ‍outcomes from viral infections.
Q: Should people⁣ be worried about HMPV,⁤ especially‌ given the context​ of previous pandemics?
A: Experts are emphasizing that there is no ⁢need for‍ alarm regarding HMPV. The vast majority ⁤of individuals ‍infected with HMPV experience mild symptoms and⁤ recover with ⁢supportive care, such as rest and hydration. The virus spreads primarily through respiratory droplets, much like other common‌ respiratory⁢ viruses.while vigilance is always ⁣important in public health, HMPV does not pose‍ the ‍same level of risk as emerging pathogens.
Q: What ⁢populations‌ are most at risk from⁣ HMPV?
A: HMPV ‍primarily ⁣affects young children, the‌ elderly, and individuals with ⁢compromised immune systems. These⁤ groups are more susceptible to complications, such as‍ severe respiratory ⁣illness. That’s‌ why it’s crucial for caregivers and healthcare providers ⁤to ‍closely monitor those at ​higher risk during this seasonal peak.
Q: What practical advice⁢ can you ​give to ⁤our readers ⁣to help reduce the transmission‍ of‍ HMPV and other respiratory viruses?
A: Maintaining good ​hygiene practices is essential.‌ This includes frequent handwashing, using alcohol-based hand sanitizers when soap​ isn’t available,⁢ and avoiding ‌close‌ contact with individuals⁢ who are ⁢symptomatic. Covering yoru mouth and nose with a tissue or your ‌elbow when coughing or sneezing⁣ can also help reduce ‌the spread of viruses. Furthermore, it’s advisable to ensure that ⁣children⁢ are ‍up-to-date with their vaccinations ‍and to consult healthcare providers if any ⁤severe symptoms‍ develop.
Q: ⁢How is the global ‌community monitoring ⁤the ​situation with HMPV?
A: Health authorities‌ across the globe ⁢are closely monitoring respiratory virus trends, including HMPV, through surveillance systems. Regular updates and research⁤ help inform public health‌ responses and guide healthcare policies. Collaboration between countries and health organizations ​only serves to strengthen our collective ability to respond to ⁤viral ⁣outbreaks effectively.
Q: thank you, Dr. Smith,⁤ for sharing your insights on ⁢HMPV. Any final thoughts you’d like to leave our readers with?
A: I’d like to underscore the importance of staying informed and practicing good hygiene. While ‌we should remain ‍aware ‌of respiratory viruses and their impacts, we should approach⁢ these situations with a balanced perspective. HMPV has been part of our viral landscape for years, and ⁢with‍ proper care and ‌monitoring, we can manage ‌our health effectively.
as ​the⁤ rise⁤ of HMPV is⁢ currently seen in ⁣China and beyond, staying informed and practicing hygiene​ is key. ​Most ⁢cases will resolve ​with rest and treatment, so ⁢the focus should remain on health management and community awareness.

author: @ElUniversal_SLP
title: Charcas, el municipio más gélido de SLP por el frente frío 14; estado registra entre 1 a 4 grados
text:
En este jueves guadalupano, el frente frío número 14 ha hecho bajar la temperatura de forma abrupta en San Luis Potosí , a pesar de que aún no comienza el invierno formalmente; de acuerdo con los registros, fue el municipio de Charcas en donde el termómetro descendió en las primeras horas de este día, pues entre la una y dos de la mañana, se alcanzó una temperatura de tan sólo 1 grado celsius. En otros municipios del Altiplano potosino , en donde regularmente se reciente el frío, también hubo bajas temperaturas, pero sin llegar a lo registrado en Charcas. En Real de Catorce llegaron a los 4 grados a las 3:00 de la mañana, en Villa de Ramos y Salinas de Hidalgo el mercurio toco lo 3 grados cerca del amanecer, a las 6:00 de la mañana.
Lo mismo en el caso de la capital potosina, puesto que a las 7:00 de la mañana se registraron también 4 grados centígrados; sin embargo, quizá lo más sorprendente son casos como los de la Huasteca Potosina , región históricamente más cálida en donde en el municipio de Aquismón se llegó a los 7 grados.
FOTOS: Así lucen los municipios de SLP con decoración navideña
Cabe destacar que actualmente permanece el frente frío número 14 sobre la entidad potosina, no obstante a partir de mañana y el fin de semana parece que se estarán recuperando las temperaturas, para viernes y sábado se pronostica que la mínima sea de 7 grados pero para la madruga del domingo de nueva cuenta se llegaría a los 4 grados en la zona metropolitana de la ciudad de San Luis Potosí.

author: Erickson Acuña
title: Christian Cueva se pronunció y tomó inmediata decisión tras su regreso a Cienciano para el Torneo Clausura 2024
text: Christian Cueva y su INMEDIATA DECISIÓN que tomó tras su regreso a Cienciano El volante Christian Cueva se encontraba sin equipo tras su despido de Cienciano por denuncia de su esposa Pamela López; sin embargo, regresó. [Únete a nuestro canal de WhatsApp](https://whatsapp.com/channel/0029Va0WpYm65yDAfxYLlA1i) Durante las últimas semanas, [Christian Cueva](https://libero.pe/futbol-peruano/cienciano/2024/09/03/cienciano-da-marcha-atras-reincorpora-christian-cueva-equipo-torneo-clausura-2024-143400) fue tendencia tras su salida de Cienciano luego de conocerse la denuncia realizada por su esposa Pamela López por violencia física. La radical medida del club imperial fue tomada solo dos días después de que lo oficializaran para que juegue el [Torneo Clausura 2024](https://libero.pe/futbol-peruano/liga-1/2024/08/23/acumulado-liga-1-peru-tabla-posiciones-torneo-clausura-2024-fecha-9-universitario-alianza-lima-sporting-cristal-melgar-1281146); sin embargo, terminó regresando. PUEDES VER: [César Vallejo y la PUBLICACIÓN que realizó tras la PRESENTACIÓN de Guerrero en Alianza Lima] Christian Cueva captó la atención en redes tras su regreso a Cienciano De esta manera, ‘Aladino’ se convirtió una vez más en protagonista de diversas portadas extradeportivas luego de su participación en la Copa América 2024 con la selección peruana. Una nueva historia inició en la carrera futbolística del volante nacional, quien volverá a la actividad tras varios meses. Cienciano anunció a través de un comunicado que decidió mantener el contrato del volante peruano, indicando que tomaron esta medida de "mantener su contratación", no sin antes haber llegado a un acuerdo que incluye el cumplimiento de "tareas excepcionales". ¿Cómo reaccionó el jugador? Días después, y en pleno receso de la Liga 1 por las Eliminatorias 2026, Christian Cueva sorprendió a sus seguidores, hinchas del equipo cusqueño y usuarios en general de las redes sociales. Para muchos cibernautas, una de las reacciones más esperadas antes de su debut en el Torneo Clausura. Y es que el popular ‘Aladino’ no solo compartió las historias que difundió el equipo en su cuenta de Instagram con particulares emoticones, sino también decidió dejar abiertos sus comentarios, muy distinto a otras de sus publicaciones en las que tuvo que restringirlas ante la ola de críticas que recibió en los últimos días por sus casos extradeportivos y nivel en la Bicolor. ¿En qué equipos jugó Christian Cueva? Christian Cueva formó parte de equipos como Universidad San Martín, Unión Española, Rayo Vallecano, Alianza Lima, Toluca, Sao Paulo, Santos, Pachuca, Yeni Malatyaspor y Al Fateh.

author: @EUTimesNET
title: Portland Residents Suffering From Deadly Disease Caused by Human Poop | EUTimes.NET ⚡ Hidden Story ⚡
text: Health official have warned of a massive surge in shigella cases in Portland due to the widespread contamination of human excrement in the city. Shigella is a deadly bacteria that spreads via fecal matter, and creates symptoms that include fever, stomach cramps, vomiting, and diarrhea. Some cases can become potentially fatal. “Shigella spreads when one person’s infected poop gets into another person’s mouth through food or water, from objects or surfaces with shigella bacteria on them, or during sex,” Multnomah County said, according to KOIN 6. “Shigella spreads very easily. Even a very small amount is enough to make someone sick.” [Thepostmillennial.com](https://thepostmillennial.com/portland-sees-increase-in-diseases-spread-by-human-waste) reports: Multnomah, Washington, and Clackamas counties have reported 45 cases of the bacteria in December, with nine different strains observed in the Portland metro area since October. The Portland Police Bureau’s Central Bike Squad also joined in on the calls for awareness, making a post about hygiene on Instagram on Dec. 22. Previously, Multnomah County discovered a “cluster” of drug-resistant shigella cases in November, with 16 cases found in the Portland metro area since September. A total of 218 cases have been reported in 2023, with the county saying that the majority of strains penetrate the region by way of international travelers and “social-sexual networks.” “Local disease patterns suggest that fecal-oral spread through sexual contact may account for between half and more than two thirds of all cases without international travel. The rest are typically attributed to other types of person-to-person spread including outbreaks among populations with lack of hygiene, shelter, and sanitation, and among people who use illicit substances,” county officials explained to KOIN 6 News. The county added that “during 2020 a single strain of Shigella caused multiple clusters among men who have sex with men, persons experiencing homelessness, as well as causing outbreaks at a food cart, and separately, a healthcare facility. Multnomah County epidemiology immediately identified these shifts into defined outbreaks and were successful in stopping illness spread from the food cart as well as within the healthcare facility.” The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention reports that there are approximately 450,000 shigella infections in the United States every year. Health officials say that while most people will recover from the illness within a week or two, symptoms can sometimes last longer and be more critical to those with weakened immune systems. RELATED ARTICLES [5G Causes Headaches, Stomach pain, difficulty Sleeping according to Swedish Study](https://www.eutimes.net/2023/12/5g-causes-headaches-stomach-pain-difficulty-sleeping-according-to-swedish-study/) [San Francisco Is Officially America's Worst City](https://www.eutimes.net/2023/09/san-francisco-is-officially-americas-worst-city/) [Former FBI Special Agent Left Homeless After Blowing Whistle On FBI & DOJ](https://www.eutimes.net/2023/05/former-fbi-special-agent-left-homeless-after-blowing-whistle-on-fbi-doj/) [African Suspect Arrested for Urinating on Homeless in Germany](https://www.eutimes.net/2023/04/african-suspect-arrested-for-urinating-on-homeless-in-germany/) [Democrats To Create Sanctuary State for Kids To Get Abortions and Sex Changes Without Parental Consent](https://www.eutimes.net/2023/03/democrats-to-create-sanctuary-state-for-kids-to-get-abortions-and-sex-changes-without-parental-consent/) [donation](https://www.eutimes.net/donations/)or [subscribing](https://feedburner.google.com/fb/a/mailverify?uri=TheEuropeanUnionTimes)to our Newsletter.
